requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Xp / 7 / 8.1 / 10/ 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or AMD Phenom 9850
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 1GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Attention: WinXP 7 8 and other systems may cause game automation to malfunction with high resolution, high image quality, frame rate, etc., but it does not affect the normal operation of the game. Win10 and Win11 systems are fine! The higher the computer configuration, the better the gaming effect! However, we highly recommend that you upgrade your computer system to Win10 or Win11, as well as your computer configuration, for the best gaming experience!
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 or AMD R5 5600G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 5600XT 6GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Note: The resolution of Win10 Win11 games will automatically be determined based on your desktop resolution. For example, if your desktop resolution is 4K, then the game will also have a 4K resolution. If the desktop resolution is 1920 * 1080, then the game will also have a 1920 * 1080 resolution. You only need to enter the game to play, and our new engine will automate all other tedious settings for you
